purpose.to_describe: the metadata and form of a NetCDF-format file

abbrev_widget_len.description: an arbitrary example of a data variable

xxxxx_Group_Attributes.group: can omit/empty, xxxxx is group name

summary.value: The PREFIRE Level 3 products provide gridded, sorted, and/or statistical representations of other PREFIRE data products.

wavelength.description: center wavelength of each spectral channel, given by the SRF-weighted mean over wavelength

idealized_wavelength.description: center wavelength of each spectral channel, in the idealized spectrometer grid

surface_type_for_sorting.description: merged surface type using coastline data, met analysis (and possibly satellite observations of) sea ice and snow cover
surface_type_for_sorting.flag_meanings: [1] open water, [2] sea ice, [3] partial sea ice, [4] permanent land ice, [5] Antarctic ice shelf, [6] snow-covered land, [7] partial snow-covered land, [8] snow-free land, [9] coastal

emis_mean.description: mean surface emissivity per latitude/longitude grid cell, cross-track scene, and spectral channel -- sorted by surface type

asc_emis_mean.description: (for ascending orbit pass only) mean surface emissivity per latitude/longitude grid cell, cross-track scene, and spectral channel -- sorted by surface type

desc_emis_mean.description: (for descending orbit pass only) mean surface emissivity per latitude/longitude grid cell, cross-track scene, and spectral channel -- sorted by surface type

emis_stdev.description: standard deviation of surface emissivity per latitude/longitude grid cell, cross-track scene, and spectral channel -- sorted by surface type

asc_emis_stdev.description: (for ascending orbit pass only) standard deviation of surface emissivity per latitude/longitude grid cell, cross-track scene, and spectral channel -- sorted by surface type

desc_emis_stdev.description: (for descending orbit pass only) standard deviation of surface emissivity per latitude/longitude grid cell, cross-track scene, and spectral channel -- sorted by surface type

count.description: count of total emissivity observations per latitude/longitude grid cell, cross-track scene, and spectral channel -- sorted by surface type

asc_count.description: (for ascending orbit pass only) count of total emissivity observations per latitude/longitude grid cell, cross-track scene, and spectral channel -- sorted by surface type

desc_count.description: (for descending orbit pass only) count of total emissivity observations per latitude/longitude grid cell, cross-track scene, and spectral channel -- sorted by surface type

emis_sum.description: sum of emissivity observations per latitude/longitude grid cell, cross-track scene, and spectral channel -- sorted by surface type

asc_emis_sum.description: (for ascending orbit pass only) sum of emissivitity observations per latitude/longitude grid cell, cross-track scene, and spectral channel -- sorted by surface type

desc_emis_sum.description: (for descending orbit pass only) sum of emissivitity observations per latitude/longitude grid cell, cross-track scene, and spectral channel -- sorted by surface type

emis_sumsquares.description: sum of emissivity*emissivity per latitude/longitude grid cell, cross-track scene, and spectral channel -- sorted by surface type

asc_emis_sumsquares.description: (for ascending orbit pass only) sum of emissivity*emissivity per latitude/longitude grid cell, cross-track scene, and spectral channel -- sorted by surface type

desc_emis_sumsquares.description: (for descending orbit pass only) sum of emissivity*emissivity per latitude/longitude grid cell, cross-track scene, and spectral channel -- sorted by surface type
